trans-unit.source: Represents a language tag for use in XAML markup.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un tag di lingua per l'utilizzo nel markup XAML.

trans-unit.source: The language tag may or may not have a registered <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> present on the system where the XAML is interpreted.
trans-unit.target: Il tag della lingua o potrebbe non essere registrato <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>presenti nel sistema in cui il codice XAML viene interpretato.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: This class is useful for dealing with values represented using `xml:lang` in XML.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe è utile per trattare i valori rappresentati utilizzando `xml:lang` in XML.

trans-unit.source: Language tags can be specified in two-character form or in a hyphenated language-locale form.
trans-unit.target: Tag di linguaggio può essere specificato in forma di due caratteri o in un formato di lingua sillabata.

trans-unit.source: See [RFC 3066](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=132454).
trans-unit.target: Vedere [RFC 3066](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=132454).

trans-unit.source: Note that the XML specification allows the empty string for `xml:lang`, although that is not permitted by RFC 3066; therefore, the XmlLanguage type permits "" (empty attribute string).
trans-unit.target: Si noti che la specifica XML consente una stringa vuota per `xml:lang`, anche se non è consentito dallo standard RFC 3066; pertanto, il tipo di XmlLanguage permette "" (stringa di attributo vuota).

trans-unit.source: A default-constructed XmlLanguage behaves as if constructed with "" (empty string).
trans-unit.target: Un XmlLanguage costruito in modo predefinito si comporta come se costruito con "" (stringa vuota).

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML Values *prefix* Language prefix, using the ISO 639-1 language prefix values.
trans-unit.target: # # Utilizzo dell'attributo XAML ``` - or - ``` # # valori XAML *prefisso* prefisso della lingua, utilizzando i valori del prefisso ISO 639-1 language.

trans-unit.source: For example "en", or "zh".
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio "en" o "zh".

trans-unit.source: Uppercase values are accepted and converted to lowercase.
trans-unit.target: I valori maiuscoli sono accettati e convertiti in caratteri minuscoli.

trans-unit.source: This may also be an empty attribute, "".
trans-unit.target: Potrebbe anche trattarsi di un attributo vuoto, "".

trans-unit.source: *subcode* If provided, must be preceded by a single hyphen.
trans-unit.target: *sottocodice* se fornito, deve essere preceduto da un trattino.

trans-unit.source: Then, a subcode as defined by RFC 3066.
trans-unit.target: Quindi, un codice secondario come definito dallo standard RFC 3066.

trans-unit.source: The most typical usage, and the one which is most likely to properly map to a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>, is a country or regional designation such as "-us" or "-hk".
trans-unit.target: L'utilizzo più comune e quello che viene probabilmente mappato correttamente a un <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>, è ad esempio un paese o regione designazione "-us" o "-hk".</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: Uppercase values are accepted and converted to lowercase.
trans-unit.target: I valori maiuscoli sono accettati e convertiti in caratteri minuscoli.

trans-unit.source: Gets a static <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"></xref> instance as would be created by <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.GetLanguage*> with the language tag as an empty attribute string.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore statico <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"> </xref> istanza come verrebbe creato da <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.GetLanguage*>con il tag della lingua come stringa di un attributo vuoto.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.GetLanguage*>

trans-unit.source: This value is in effect the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage> corresponding to <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, whose <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.GetEquivalentCulture%2A> result is <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Questo valore è attiva la <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage>corrispondente a <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, il cui <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.GetEquivalentCulture%2A>risultato è <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.GetEquivalentCulture%2A> </xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage>

trans-unit.source: The empty language tag version of <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"></xref>, for use in comparison operations.
trans-unit.target: La versione del tag di lingua vuoto <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"> </xref>, per l'utilizzo nelle operazioni di confronto.

trans-unit.source: Returns the appropriate equivalent <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"></xref>, if and only if such a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> is registered for the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.IetfLanguageTag*> value of this <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"></xref>
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'appropriato equivalente <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>per questo <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"> </xref>, se e solo se un <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>è registrato per il <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.IetfLanguageTag*>valore di questo <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"> </xref> </xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.IetfLanguageTag*> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: If no equivalent <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> can be produced, this method raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: Se nessun equivalente <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>può essere prodotta, questo metodo genera un'eccezione.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: If you do not wish to handle exceptions, call <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.GetSpecificCulture%2A> instead.
trans-unit.target: Se non si desidera gestire le eccezioni, chiamare <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.GetSpecificCulture%2A>invece.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.GetSpecificCulture%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that can be used for localization-globalization API calls that take that type as an argument.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>che può essere utilizzato per le chiamate API di globalizzazione o localizzazione che accettano tale tipo come argomento.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: No registered <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> for the provided <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"></xref> exists, as determined by a call to <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultureInfoByIetfLanguageTag*>.
trans-unit.target: No registrato <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>per forniti <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"> </xref> esiste, come determinato da una chiamata a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultureInfoByIetfLanguageTag*>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultureInfoByIetfLanguageTag*> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"></xref> instance, based on a string representing the language per RFC 3066.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"> </xref> istanza, in base a una stringa che rappresenta la lingua per RFC 3066.

trans-unit.source: This method is effectively the constructor.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo è in modo efficace il costruttore.

trans-unit.source: The language string may be empty, or else must conform to [RFC 3066](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=132454) rules: - The first subtag must consist of only [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ascii](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ascii-md.md)] letters.
trans-unit.target: La stringa di lingua può essere vuota oppure deve essere conforme alle [RFC 3066](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=132454) regole:-il primo sottotag deve essere costituito solo [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ascii](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ascii-md.md)] lettere.

trans-unit.source: - Additional subtags must consist [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ascii](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ascii-md.md)] letters or numerals.
trans-unit.target: -Deve essere composta da sottotag aggiuntivi [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ascii](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ascii-md.md)] lettere o numeri.

trans-unit.source: - Subtags are separated by a single hyphen character.
trans-unit.target: -Sottotag sono separati da un carattere trattino.

trans-unit.source: - Every subtag must be 1 to 8 characters long.
trans-unit.target: -Ogni sottotag deve essere da 1 a 8 caratteri.

trans-unit.source: - No leading or trailing hyphens are permitted.
trans-unit.target: -Nessuna trattini iniziali o finali sono consentiti.

trans-unit.source: An RFC 3066 language string, or empty string.
trans-unit.target: Una stringa di lingua RFC 3066 o stringa vuota.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"></xref> with the provided string as its <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.IetfLanguageTag*> value.
trans-unit.target: Un nuovo <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"> </xref> con la stringa fornita come relativo <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.IetfLanguageTag*>valore.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.IetfLanguageTag*>

trans-unit.source: ietfLanguageTag parameter cannot be null.
trans-unit.target: ietfLanguageTagparametro non può essere null.

trans-unit.source: ietfLanguageTag parameter was non-empty, but did not conform to the syntax specified in RFC 3066.
trans-unit.target: ietfLanguageTagparametro non era vuota, ma non è conforme alla sintassi specificata in RFC 3066.

trans-unit.source: See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: Vedere la sezione Osservazioni.

trans-unit.source: Returns the most-closely-related non-neutral <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce lo strettamente correlato non neutro <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>per questo <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"> </xref>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: If this <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage> is equal to <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.Empty%2A?displayProperty=fullName> then this method will return <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Se questo <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage>è uguale a <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.Empty%2A?displayProperty=fullName>questo metodo restituirà <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.Empty%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage>

trans-unit.source: This method finds the registered <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> matching the longest-possible prefix of this <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo individua registrato <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>che corrisponde al prefisso più lungo possibile di questo <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage>.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: If that registered <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> is neutral (<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.IsNeutralCulture%2A> is `true`), then this method relies on a call to <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CreateSpecificCulture%2A> to map from a neutral <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> to a specific one.
trans-unit.target: Se registrati <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>neutro (<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.IsNeutralCulture%2A> è `true`), questo metodo si basa su una chiamata a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CreateSpecificCulture%2A>per eseguire il mapping da un neutro <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>a uno specifico.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CreateSpecificCulture%2A> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.IsNeutralCulture%2A> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that can be used for localization-globalization [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-api-md.md)] calls that take that type as an argument.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>che può essere utilizzato per la globalizzazione o localizzazione [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-api-md.md)] chiamate che accettano tale tipo come argomento.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: No related non-neutral <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> is registered for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"></xref> <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.IetfLanguageTag*>.
trans-unit.target: Non correlato non neutro <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>è registrato per l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"> </xref> <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.IetfLanguageTag*>.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.IetfLanguageTag*> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: Gets the string representation of the language tag.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la rappresentazione di stringa del tag della lingua.

trans-unit.source: This property may return a normalized version of the originally-specified string as provided to <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.GetLanguage%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà può restituire una versione normalizzata della stringa specificata in origine come fornita a <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.GetLanguage%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.GetLanguage%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property may also return <xref:System.String.Empty> if an empty string was provided to <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.GetLanguage%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà può restituire anche <xref:System.String.Empty>se è stata fornita una stringa vuota a <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.GetLanguage%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.GetLanguage%2A> </xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the language tag.
trans-unit.target: Rappresentazione di stringa del tag della lingua.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> that represents the current <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un <xref:System.String>che rappresenta l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This returns the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.IetfLanguageTag%2A> value of the current <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.IetfLanguageTag%2A>valore dell'oggetto corrente <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage>.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage> </xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.IetfLanguageTag%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the current <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.String>che rappresenta l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>
